description:
USN-3307-1 fixed a vulnerability in OpenLDAP. This update provides the
corresponding update for ubuntu 12.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 Karsten Heymann discovered that OpenLDAP incorrectly handled certain search
 requests. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause slapd to crash,
 resulting in a denial of service.
title: OpenLDAP vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
OpenLDAP could be made to crash if it received specially crafted
network traffic.
